name: Sall
appearance: Lean woman with lantern-light freckles, a whisper-scar across her throat, and brass earrings shaped like shuttered lamps. Moves like fog slipping over railings.
character: Soft-spoken and steel-nerved; prefers the knot cut clean to the throat cut messy.
talents: vanishes into crowds with a change of shadow
tunes lanterns by ear to signal codes
turns enemies into buyers with two sentences
flaws: avoids open fights even when needed
dreams: acquire an oath-lantern shard to compel clean promises in the dark
stabilize cavern routes beneath Moonhook for a generation
retire to a coast with no glass and no bells
secrets: keeps hush-debts on two Ledger masks that could split their cabal
once saved a Tidewarden child from a rip current and never told the mother
sits on the hidden court that arbitrates Syndicate disputes
